== Introduction

This section contains *bold*, _italic_, and `monospace` text.

Here's a link to https://rust-lang.org[Rust] and an email mailto:info@example.com[contact].

=== Code Example

[source,rust]
----
fn fibonacci(n: u32) -> u32 {
    match n {
        0 => 0,
        1 => 1,
        _ => fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2),
    }
}
----

== Conclusion

This document demonstrates various AsciiDoc features and their Markdown conversion.

Some features like H~2~O (subscript) and E=mc^2^ (superscript) use HTML tags in Markdown.
